nodes.text: Chen Yao was the corporate president of Fire, a space station and city of the Heaven system. Born to great wealth, Chen lacked the ambition and scheming nature of Zhang Jincheng, a general district manager of Fire. President Chen set his eyes on the Blue Dragon pirates after they plundered an important freighter at Fire, causing Zhang to seek to take Chen's place and climb up the space city's hierarchy by eliminating the pirates.

Zhang thus allowed the pirates to take a shipment of enigmatic tenebrae from the Knights of Silver Dawn, a prominent civil mercenary group in the area, in the hopes of manipulating the Knights into open conflict against the Blue Dragon. However, the Knights' elite red apricot squad was sent to retrieve their lost shipment, and the squad leader, Captain An Ping, realized Zhang's ploy. Red apricot squad's newest member, Sean, therefore proposed to continue with their pursuit of the enigmatic tenebrae and place the blame of recent incidents at Fire on Zhang afterwards, hoping that Chen Yao would become weary of Zhang, making the latter's days miserable.

Chen Yao was mentioned in The Vow of Silver Dawn, a Chinese web novel written by "His Majesty the King." Chen was first mentioned in a chapter released in 2021, and he is named 陈耀 in the original simplified Chinese text.
